title: I was recently perma banned and did not get a reason.

embed.description: idlegibbon1 / Silver 4 50LP / 253W 224L Win Ratio 53% / Draven - 53W 36L Win Ratio 60%, Lux - 57W 31L Win Ratio 65%, Yasuo - 27W 24L Win Ratio 53%, Tryndamere - 17W 7L Win Ratio 71%, Veigar - 15W 8L Win Ratio 65%

replies.body: It looks like this was placed on your account due to a [**chargeback **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334)you issued. You should be able to reach out to our agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get that taken care of.
